series_description: This series documents fatal and major accident sites located within a district and includes reviews and recommendations to improve the safety of the site. This series may include, but is not limited to: inspections, reviews, reports, recommendations and correspondence.

This series documents an organization's or individual's "adoption" of a specific section of a highway for litter control trash removal. This series may include, but is not limited to:permits, reports, and correspondence.

This series documents land use permits that have been for utility, private, and commercial use entrances involving owned rights-of-way or property. This series may include, but not limited to:permits, forms, reports, and correspondence.

This series documents permits that are issued on a one-time basis for special use (e.g., parades, block parties, bicycle etc.) of VDOT-owned rights-of-way or property. This series include, but is not limited to: permits, forms, and correspondence.
This series documents funding and scheduling for road improvements and maintenance within a residency. This may include, but is not limited to: schedules, reports, forms, correspondence.

This series documents all activities involving a specific road or route within the VDOT residency such as complaints, traffic studies/counts, roadway sign postings, street indices, and road closures. This series may include, but is not limited to: correspondence, sketches, road inventories, forms, and
retention_statement: 0 Years after no longer administratively useful

series_description: This series documents the addition of city or county roads to the VDOT secondary road system for maintenance, modifications, and plans resulting from land use permit and development activities. This series may include, but is not limited to: As-built plans, plats, correspondence, resolutions, permits and forms.
retention_statement: 0 Years after no longer administratively useful
